emailColumn.title: Email Templates - Chapter 3

authorInfo.title: About the Author
authorInfo.description: Dr. Maria Gonzalez specializes in international business expansion and cross-cultural communication strategies with over 12 years of experience in global market penetration.

materialsUsed: Porter, M. (2008). Competitive Strategy. Free Press.
Hofstede, G. (2010). Cultures and Organizations. McGraw-Hill.
Trompenaars, F. (2012). Riding the Waves of Culture. Nicholas Brealey.
International Business Review (2021). "Global Expansion Strategies" - Cross-Cultural Management Journal.

keyTakeaways.title: Key Takeaways
keyTakeaways.description: Successful global expansion requires deep understanding of local markets, cultural nuances, and regulatory environments. Focus on building strategic partnerships and adapting your value proposition to local needs.

emails.subject: Global Market Entry Strategy - Your Complete Guide
emails.preview: Dear Global Entrepreneur, expanding into international markets requires careful planning and strategic execution. This comprehensive guide covers market research, regulatory compliance, cultural adaptation, and partnership strategies...

highlight.title: Market Entry Strategy
highlight.description: Complete framework for international expansion with risk assessment and cultural adaptation strategies
